analysis.description:
ESportsFreezingStorage.release (/unique_chucks/4/0xe29c5b523590165795bbd7d52369c2895b18841f.sol#92-111) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == 0

ESportsToken.returnFrozenFreeFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = frozenStorages[x].release(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/4/0xe29c5b523590165795bbd7d52369c2895b18841f.sol#396)
